headline: Oliver Wyman Unveils Comprehensive Labor Cost Per Vehicle Analysis Amidst Changing Automotive Landscape
summary: NEW YORK, May 06, 2025--Oliver Wyman, a global leader in management consulting and a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE:MMC) today launches its latest Labor Cost per Vehicle analysis. As the automotive industry faces economic headwinds, shifting global production landscapes, and rising geopolitical tensions, this comparative analysis examines the labor cost per vehicle (LCPV), a critical metric that influences automaker profitability and competitiveness.
